DOC.brief_title: The Effects Resistance Exercises Glycemic Control Women With Gestational Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Gestational diabetes diagnosis Sedentary Nonsmokers Age 18 45 year old Prepregnancy BMI less 35 , without limit physical factor conduct exercise With single pregnancy without fetal malformation : gestational age 24 34 week , condition contraindicate conduct exercise , risk factor preterm delivery consent participate study Patients develop clinical obstetric complication contraindicate conduct exercise pregnancy Patients start form physical activity randomize control group Patients start another form physical activity resistance exercise randomize intervention group Patients use another product insulin form glycemic control Patients abandon study
